title: Tosin Abasi (Animals as Leaders, guitar maker, supercar owner)
description:
Tosi Abasi is an unbelievable guitarist and the founder of instrumental progressive metal band, Animals as Leaders. He's also the founder of Abasi Concepts, which produces beautiful guitars that sound even better than the look. His success has allowed him to own some very fast cars but unlike most supercar owners, Tosin drives his cars at the track and in the canyons quite frequently. 

We talk about life as a self-taught guitarist, his journey with music, his cars, and more. 

https://abasiconcepts.com/ 

https://www.instagram.com/tosinabasi/ 

Go to HelloFresh.com/smokingtire14 and use code smokingtire14 for up to 14 free meals, including free shipping. This show was recorded on October 4, 2021. 

Join our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast 

Follow us! T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

Click here for the most honest car reviews out there: https://www.youtube.com/thesmokingtire 

Want shorter podcasts? Subscribe to our new CLIPS channel! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD4WGV-W5zD1MK4yHbNGwmw NEW SHIRTS! https://www.blipshift.com/tst
